game.name: BONELAB
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: BONELAB is an experimental physics action game. Explore a mysterious lab filled with weapons, enemies, challenges and secrets. Escape your reality, or wreak havoc. No wrong answers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: BONELAB is an experimental physics action game. Explore a mysterious lab filled with weapons, enemies, challenges and secrets. Escape your reality, or wreak havoc. No wrong answers.

reviewHighlights.text: Good game, i don't know what to say. Mods are very fun. The game on it's own is good but is way better with mods.
---{ Graphics }--- ☐ You forget what reality is ☑ Beautiful ☐ Good ☐ Decent ☐ Bad ☐ Don‘t look too long at it ☐ MS-DOS ---{ Gameplay }--- ☑ Very good...
